page.title: 20People working on 'Domesday'
page.content: We had only a few weeks in which to complete our Domesday survey, but we learned a lot in that time. Our school (R A Butler Junior School, in Saffron Walden) was four miles from the area to be surveyed, so we had to go by car each time we made a visit. Some of the children's parents, and school staff, helped with transport. People whom we asked to talk to us were very willing to help; they felt the project was worthwhile because it was being done by children. Most of the research was done by: {Caroline Chesworth : Melinda Potter {Sally Winterbottom : Nick Jones {Victoria Coates : Trudy Ingham {Ben Pughe-Morgan : Tom Ratcliffe {Bridget McDermott : Joanne Piper {Rachel Dodsley : Nicholas Capon} and their teacher,{David Jarratt.
